Pre-Game Insights: The Indian cricket team will be firm favourites to win the first T20I of the five-match series against Zimbabwe owing to their greater exposure to top-quality cricket and the ability to play aggressive cricket irrespective of the situations or opponents.
Zimbabwe last played a T20I nearly two months ago against Bangladesh during an away series, which they lost 1-4, leading to a wholesale number of changes in the squad.
India have a 6-2 win-loss record against Zimbabwe in T20I cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the Harare Sports Club are known to be quite decent for batting, but it also provides early assistance to the pacers.
The average first innings score of 156 runs in T20Is at this venue might not prove to be enough for either India or Zimbabwe to defend in the first match of their upcoming series.
